subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Jim Leyritz said he had sold off memorabilia because he is broke, has become a social pariah and had pored over case files, intent on defeating a D.U.I. manslaughter charge.
snippet: Jim Leyritz said he had sold off memorabilia because he is broke, has become a social pariah and had pored over case files, intent on defeating a D.U.I. manslaughter charge.
